My name is Marco Orlandin. Iâ€™m a 30-year old developer born in Vercelli (Italy) with a grave addiction to problem solving.

When I was 10 I got my first Internet Connection and by that day my life is literally changed. I started learning what today we call "front-end development" and a couple of years later I realized that it wasn't enought for me so I became a "back-end developer".

7 years later I understood that what I wanted to do was to start my own business for being a full time developer and so it was.

In my spare time I like to explore things, to experiment, to satisfy my curiosity, to learn new things.
